title: Huanmeng Shan Hai Yao
overview: n modern Japan, there are certain clans that are organized by Kings, of which there are seven. They are running Japan, trying to do everything possible to make life easier for people. However, they are completely unaware of the serious consequences they will face. The thing is that in the distant jungle there are people who have serious claims to the kings who once drove them out of their kingdom. But the moment has come when they have to re-engage in a fierce battle, which this time may end in the triumph of the representatives of the jungle.They have a secret weapon that they are going to use in the fight against the Kings. However, powerful warriors are not going to give up so easily, but plan to do everything possible to protect their own possessions, although it will not be so easy to do so. Serious changes await them ahead, for which the people of Japan are completely unprepared. A powerful hero also appears, who is ready to engage in an unequal battle with representatives of the jungle. A battle begins, which can suffer serious losses on both sides.
